name: Slipstream (itch) (nikolay.staykov)
description:
Slipstream is a procedurally generated 3d infinite runner with a vaporwave aesthetic, partially inspired by race the sun. 

Features:

- a procedurally generated level that changes in every run

- 8 music tracks by SteviaDX (https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/)

- 8 different selectable skins

- 8 unlockable upgrades

- basic options for audio, video and rebindable controls
